thread.title: The Most Pet-Friendly Vacation Spots In The U.S.
thread.title_full: The Most Pet-Friendly Vacation Spots In The U.S.

author: Kate Bratskeir
title: The Most Pet-Friendly Vacation Spots In The U.S.
text:
The Most Pet-Friendly Vacation Spots In The U.S. You guys deserve a getaway. Kate Bratskeir Food and Health Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/26/2015 10:02 AM EDT 
Your pet is part of the family, so it only makes sense that you'd want to bring your beloved four-legged friend along on fun vacations and road trips . It just wouldn't be the same with out 'em. 
To provide your pooch with the most welcoming experience, take a trip to Scottsdale, Arizona. Hipmunk, a travel company, found Scottsdale to be the city with the highest percentage of pet-friendly hotels . (We're not sure if any offer pet-human couples' massages, though. You're on your own for that.) 
You don't have to limit your journey to one direction. DogVacay put together this easy-to-read infographic that highlights paw-approving destinations all around the country. Check it out, then start planning your next getaway. Your pup will be thrilled to keep you company.
